fullplot: A team-building weekend in the mountains of Eastern Europe goes horribly wrong for the sales division of the multi-national weapons company Palisade Defence when they become the victims of a group of crazed killers who will stop at nothing to see them dead.
plot: During a team-building retreat in the mountains a group of sales representatives are hunted down one by one.
title: Severance

tomatoes.consensus: A twisted and bloody spoof on office life, Severance nicely balances comedy and nasty horror.
